title: Spicy Chickpea Stew
author: Zara Kintu
instructions: Sauté chopped onions and garlic in oil until translucent. Add cumin, paprika, and chili flakes. Stir in chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. Add chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer for 15 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Season with salt. Serve hot with rice or flatbread.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
author: Leo Martinez
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. In a pan, sauté garlic and mushrooms in butter until golden. Add cream and simmer. Stir in parmesan and cooked pasta. Mix well, season, and garnish with parsley.

title: Shakshuka
author: Amira Said
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in olive oil. Add tomatoes, paprika, cumin, and chili. Simmer until thick. Make small wells and crack in eggs. Cover and cook until eggs are just set. Serve with bread.

title: Thai Basil Fried Rice
author: Noah Tan
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion in oil. Add chicken or tofu and cook through. Push to the side, scramble an egg. Add rice, sauces, and chili. Stir-fry until hot. Toss in basil leaves and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
author: Kemi Obasi
instructions: Stir-fry all veggies in hot oil. Add ginger and garlic. Mix soy sauce with cornstarch and a bit of water, pour into the pan. Stir until sauce thickens. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.

title: Butternut Squash Soup
author: Daniel Wanjohi
instructions: Roast squash, carrots, and garlic with olive oil. In a pot, sauté onion, add roasted vegetables and broth. Simmer, then blend until smooth. Stir in cream or coconut milk. Season and serve warm.
